name: Rice
description: Rice needs warm temperatures and plenty of water; commonly grown in paddies.

name: Wheat
description: Wheat prefers cooler climates and well-drained soil.

name: Maize
short: Versatile cereal used for food and feed.
description: Maize grows in warm climates with moderate rainfall.
benefits: Used for food, feed, and industry.

name: Millet
description: Millets are small-seeded cereals, tolerant to dry conditions.
benefits: Nutritious and resilient to harsh climates.

name: Soybean
description: Soybean fixes nitrogen and is rich in protein.
benefits: High protein content; used for oil and feed.

name: Sorghum
description: Sorghum tolerates drought and poor soils.
benefits: Used for grain, fodder and industrial uses.

name: Barley
description: Barley grows well in cooler climates and is used for feed and malting.
benefits: Used in brewing, feed and food.

name: Cotton
description: Cotton requires warm temperatures and a frost-free period.
benefits: Major cash crop for fiber production.

name: Potato
description: Potatoes prefer cool, well-drained soils and consistent moisture.
benefits: Staple vegetable crop with high yields.

name: Tomato
description: Tomatoes need warm days and cool nights for best fruiting.
benefits: High vitamin content and culinary value.

name: Chili Pepper
description: Peppers need warm temperatures and well-drained soil.
benefits: High market value and culinary use.

name: Banana
description: Banana requires warm temperatures and abundant water.
benefits: High-yield fruit crop with strong local demand.
